alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Henderson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 11:37AM EST until February 05 at 8:48PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois...Indiana... Ohio River at Newburgh Dam, Mount Vernon, J.T. Myers Dam and Shawneetown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pah. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Newburgh Dam. * WHEN...Until Monday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 39.2 feet. - Bankfull stage is 35.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 41.2 feet Friday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 38.0 feet. &&
